p: This review focuses on the history and discovery of the hepatitis E virus and discusses reported outbreaks in order to share new aspects and insights into its epidemiology and global circulation. Furthermore, it explores studies on the virology of HEV to portray a detailed picture of the known stages of the viral life cycle. Finally, it briefly summarizes the clinical aspects to underline the significant need for further research into the viral pathophysiology contributing to this underrated emerging infectious disease.
